column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: service. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.com/> .ex:Service rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:hasServiceProvider rdf:type rdf:Property ;   rdfs:domain ex:Service ;   rdfs:range ex:ServiceProvider .ex:ServiceProvider rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:hasServiceType rdf:type rdf:Property ;   rdfs:domain ex:Service ;   rdfs:range ex:ServiceType .ex:ServiceType rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:hasServiceDuration rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Service ;    rdfs:range xsd:duration .ex:hasServiceCost rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Service ;    rdfs:range xsd:float .```
